```{r}
#install.packages("readxl")
library(readxl)

#install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)

#install.packages("writexl")
library(writexl)

#install.packages("openxlsx")
library(openxlsx)

# Load the clipr package
library(clipr)
```


```{r}
ethnicity2023 <- read.csv("MEP_oslaua_2023.csv") %>%
  rename(area = oslaua, abd2023 = abd) #filters 

ethnicity1997 <- read.csv("MEP_oslaua_1997.csv") %>%
  rename(area = oslaua, abd1997 = abd)

regionData <- read_csv("region2024.csv") %>% 
  rename(area = LAD24CD)
```

```{r}
jointData <- ethnicity2023 %>%
  left_join(regionData %>% select(area, LAD24NM), by = "area") %>%
  left_join(ethnicity1997 %>% select (area, abd1997), by = "area") %>%
  select(LAD24NM, area, abd1997,abd2023) %>%
  mutate(abd2023 = abd2023 * 100) %>%
  mutate(abd1997 = abd1997 * 100) %>%
  write_clip()
  
```
